name: SpellingQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open Spelling Quiz.”
”Alexa ask Spelling Quiz for help.”
”Alexa, play Spelling Quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spelling quiz
des:
Spelling can be challenging. Whether you're playing this for fun, to test your memory or to train for a spelling contest, we promise that you'll achieve your goal. This game has 5 levels with increasing difficulty from 1 to 5. The first two are available for free and the rest are available through in skill purchasing.
1) easy
2) normal
3) competition
4) back spelling
5) back spelling competition. 
Feel free to grab a paper and pen if you're new to spelling quizzes. You might need it for some of the levels.

Each round has 7 questions. 
In easy level, on every question, you'll be given the spelling of a simple word and you will have to guess it from a list of 4 items. These are really easy.
In normal level, on every question, you'll be given the spelling of a word and you will have to guess it from a list of 4 items. These are a bit more difficult.
In competition level, on every question, you'll be given a word and you must guess the correct way of spelling it from a list of 4 items. It brings along the real spelling competition vibe.
In back spelling level, on every question, you'll be given a words spelled backwards and you will need to guess it from a list of 4 items.
In back spelling competition, on every question, you'll be given a word and you will need to guess the correct way of spelling it backwards.

You can answer each question by saying the number that corresponds to the answer you believe it's correct.
If at any point you get confused, you can ask Alexa to repeat the question. Also, you can ask Alexa for help.
At the end of each round, you can change your game level by saying "change level" or play another round at the same difficulty by saying "start new game".

Have fun!
